title: How To Make Your Own Soap (gnv64)
description:
How To Make Your Own Soap 
by Sally Hornsey
Spring Hill | June 2014 | ePUB | ISBN: 978-1-90897-423-5 | 123 pages | 31.8 mb

This book will guide you through creating your own liquid and bar soap. Design and create bars of soap using traditional methods that incorporate moisturising oils and butters, and make fun and funky glycerine soaps that look almost too fabulous to use.
If you prefer liquid soaps then this book also explains how to create liquid and cream soaps from scratch as well as how to design body washes using many of the easily obtainable surfactants.

About the Author
Sally Hornsey runs Plush Folly, a cosmetic training company specialising in a range of cosmetic-making workshops, home study courses and kits. Sally has taught many students how to design a range of bar and liquid soaps for their own use, giving them the skills and knowledge needed to establish a flourishing business. Sally lives in Middlesex.
